package.name: arp_reach_launch
package.description: This package contains a launch file which will launch the pcd_processing, xml_processing, and arp_reach service nodes! As a result a client (Or series of clients) built for this pipline will handle the full pipline from PoseArray to the results of those poses as a function of reach!
package.author: Natalie T. Chmura
package.maintainer: Natalie T. Chmura (AIMS Lab @ The Ohio State University)
